alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 4:14PM CDT until May 30 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central McPherson County in central Kansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 414 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Windom, or 8 miles west of Mcpherson, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central McPherson County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
